sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: RYLST a city of Russia, in the government of Kursk, and the capital of a circle of the same name. It is built at the junction of the river Ryla with the Gem, and contains four stone and fourteen wooden churches, 840 houses, with 6300 inhabitants, who have considerable trade. It is 847 miles from St Petersburg. Long. 35. 3. E. Lat. 51. 35. N.
